sentences.english: Most of more than two persons, suddenly the doorbell rang and found it was a bright and cheerful disposition.
sentences.chinese: 二人争持不下，突然门铃一响，发现竟然是开朗。

sentences.english: And I believe it is also the principle that is reflected in the norms governing international relations.
sentences.chinese: 我想这也是国际相干准则所争持的“理”。

sentences.english: Emmanuel and don't want to separate the two attacks, brother Jackie favoured.
sentences.chinese: 埃利不想分开杰姬，兄弟两发作争持。

sentences.english: If a relationship is strong enough, its no big deal for arguements or conflicts.
sentences.chinese: 假设一段关系够稳定的话，争持和抵触只是小事。

sentences.english: My father fought for me to play footpitch.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲由于踢足球的是和我争持过。

sentences.english: A timely paymentet-doux can patch up a fans' quarrel.
sentences.chinese: 一封适时的情书可以终止情侣间的争持。

sentences.english: I wish to see who can still fight when the chips are down.
sentences.chinese: 我想看看谁可以在危急的情况下争持战争。
他是一个顽固争持的人。

sentences.english: The results also made up a new round of 50-year-old huff, two people.
sentences.chinese: 结果又惹起新一轮的争持，两人不欢而散。
